title: How to make $7,000 in a few months as a 13-year-old - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends on what type of business you plan to get the income from, your capital also matter. But forex trading is the best ways to earn such amount in few month. With $500 to $1000 as capital, you can make $7000 in 6 month but you will need to acquire the skill and also a mentor who can guide you on how the business work's. Though forex is risky but with right mentorship it can be lot easier and rewarding too.
Depends on whether ur a boy or a girl lol
